title: When It’s Cold?
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Haah…. It’s cold everyday-nya…...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>It really has been~. Hey Rin-chan, want to do something warm?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Then let’s go play Oshikura Manjuu-nya!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>That really is a classic on cold days. I played it often with Chika-chan in the past<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>But, I’ve been thinking about it since back then…. the truth is, Oshikura Manjuu….doesn’t really warm you up….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Eh!? Really-nya!? But Rin loves cuddling with friends~! So! I’ll do it with You-san too-nya! Huuug~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Waa~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
